outboundReferences.contextLine: ZRS replicates your Azure Storage data **synchronously** across **three [[azure-availability-zones]] in the primary region**.
When creating a storage account, you must select the primary region. The paired secondary region is assigned automatically, based on [[azure-region-pairs]], and cannot be changed.

inboundReferences.contextLine: - **The hot and cool tiers support all [[azure-storage-redundancy-types]] options**. The archive tier supports only LRS, GRS, and RA-GRS.
